text:
Hana-chan, why don't you try moving a bit?
And feel free to change your expression too.

(She doesn't seem to be very comfortable
with the photo shoot.)

(But it's her first time,
so with more experience, she'll get used to it...)

...Okay.
I'll do a quick check, so please wait a moment!

(Hana... Looks like she's enjoying herself,
which is what matters most...!)
